title: 5 Jungle Strategies Rush Abused To Hit Challenger (78% Win Rate!)

embed.description: If you're interested in learning how Rush was able to reach challenger on the Korean solo queue ladder with a 78% win rate, then watch this video. This video will teach you 5 simple jungle strategies Rush abused to hit challenger and win games within 25 minutes on a consistent basis.

body:
"If you're interested in learning how Rush was able to reach challenger on the Korean solo queue ladder with a 78% win rate, then watch this video.

This video will teach you 5 simple jungle strategies Rush abused to hit challenger and win games within 25 minutes on a consistent basis.

Here's what you'll learn in this action-packed guide:

First, I'll show you how to perform a "Pregame Analysis" with 4 key questions that will give you a strategy to help you win your future games.

Then, in the second jungle strategy, I'll teach you 1 simple technique that will help you easily watch the minimap as you're jungling.

Thirdly, I'll be teaching what I like to call the "Wrap Around Gank." This strategy is something that a lot of Korean challenger junglers do which completely shuts a lane down, making it a 4v5 and heavily increasing your chances of winning the game.

Then, I'll dive into "Invading" and why it's a simple yet effective strategy you can use to completely shut down the enemy jungle and take away his jungle camps.

And lastly - the fifth strategy I'll teach you is "The Milk-It Method." This is a strategy that Rush uses to completely suffocate the enemy team and starving them of their resources whilst increasing the amount of gold and experience you'll get. "
